channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Florence + The Machine @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:30 — Florence + The Machine at Chase Center. Florence + The Machine is known for their powerful live performances and emotional depth, making this a highly anticipated tour.

item.title: Demi Lovato @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-12 03:00 — Demi Lovato at Chase Center. Demi Lovato's tour promises to showcase her growth as an artist and connect with fans through her personal journey.

item.title: Ariana Grande @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-06-07 03:00 → 2026-06-11 03:00 — Ariana Grande at Oakland Arena. Ariana Grande's tour is expected to feature her latest hits and elaborate stage production, appealing to a wide audience.

item.title: Meghan Trainor @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-08-09 01:30 — Meghan Trainor at Chase Center. Meghan Trainor's tour highlights her catchy pop sound and engaging stage presence, making it a fun experience.

item.title: RUSH @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-10-16 02:30 → 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's legacy and the nostalgia surrounding their music will attract long-time fans to this special tour.

item.title: Three Days Grace @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Three Days Grace brings a hard rock edge that resonates with fans, promising a high-energy performance.

item.title: Jack Johnson @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back style and connection to his audience make his shows a relaxing and enjoyable experience.

item.title: Bob Moses @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Bob Moses is known for their captivating electronic performances, blending live instrumentation with electronic beats.

item.title: The Neighbourhood @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-10-08 02:30 — The Neighbourhood at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. The Neighbourhood's unique blend of alternative and R&B elements promises an engaging live show.

item.title: Levity @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-05-10 02:30 — Levity at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Lewis Capaldi's heartfelt ballads and emotional performances are sure to resonate with fans.

item.title: St. Lucia @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-05-18 03:00 — St. Lucia at August Hall. St. Lucia's vibrant sound and engaging performances make them a must-see for indie pop fans.

item.title: VNV Nation @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-04-27 02:30 — VNV Nation at August Hall. VNV Nation's electronic music and engaging live shows have a dedicated following, making this a notable event.

item.title: Seven Lions @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-05-31 02:30 — Seven Lions at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Evanescence's powerful live performances and iconic hits draw a dedicated crowd.

item.title: Joyce Manor @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:00 — Joyce Manor at The Fillmore. Joyce Manor's punk-infused sound and energetic performances are appealing to a niche audience.

item.title: Santigold @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-05-17 03:00 — Santigold at The Castro Theatre. Santigold's eclectic style and engaging stage presence make her a compelling live act.

item.title: Olivia Dean @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-07-12 03:00 — Olivia Dean at Chase Center. Olivia Dean's rising star status and soulful sound are attracting attention in the music scene.
